member.name: ITfMessagePump.GetMessageA
member.summary: Obtains a message from the message queue and does not return until a message is obtained. This is the ANSI version of this method.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives message data.
Handle to the window whose messages are obtained. The window must belong to the current thread. If this value is NULL, this method obtains messages for any window that belongs to the calling thread.
Specifies the lowest message value obtained.
Specifies the highest message value obtained.
Pointer to a BOOL value that receives the return value from the GetMessage function.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfMessagePump.GetMessageW
member.summary: Obtains a message from the message queue and does not return until a message is obtained. This is the Unicode version of this method.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives message data.
Handle to the window whose messages are obtained. The window must belong to the current thread. If this value is NULL, this method obtains messages for any window owned by the calling thread.
Specifies the lowest message value to obtain.
Specifies the highest message value to obtain.
Pointer to a BOOL that receives the return value from the GetMessage function.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfMessagePump.PeekMessageA
member.summary: Obtains a message from the message queue and returns if no message is obtained. This is the ANSI version of this method.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives message data.
Handle to the window whose messages are obtained. The window must belong to the current thread. If this value is NULL, this method obtains messages for any window owned by the calling thread.
Specifies the lowest message value to obtain.
Specifies the highest message value to obtain.
Specifies how messages are handled. For more information, see the PeekMessage function.
Pointer to a BOOL that receives the return value from the PeekMessage function.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfMessagePump.PeekMessageW
member.summary: Obtains a message from the message queue and returns if no message is obtained. This is the Unicode version of this method.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives message data.
Handle to the window whose messages are obtained. The window must belong to the current thread. If this value is NULL, this method obtains messages for any window that belongs to the calling thread.
Specifies the lowest message value to obtain.
Specifies the highest message value to obtain.
Specifies how messages are handled. For more information, see the PeekMessage function.
Pointer to a BOOL that receives the return value from the PeekMessage function.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfMessagePump
member.summary: The ITfMessagePump interface is implemented by the TSF manager and is used by an application to obtain messages from the application message queue. The methods of this interface are wrappers for the GetMessage and functions. This interface enables the TSF manager to perform any necessary pre-message or post-message processing.
